Let's load our data.
```{r}
dat <- readLines("/home/vanyadeg/Desktop/diploma/data/EIoc/EI-oc-En-anger-train.txt")

dat = as.data.frame(do.call(rbind, strsplit(dat, split="\t")), stringsAsFactors=FALSE)

dat = dat[c("V2", "V4")]
head(dat)
```
And rename columns.
```{r}
library(plyr)
dat = rename(dat, c("V2" = "tweet", "V4" = "class"))
head(dat)
```
Let's analyze!
```{r}
percentage <- prop.table(table(dat$class)) * 100
cbind(freq=table(dat$class), percentage=percentage)
```
